articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 36 - Birds' Love
articles.description: It's nesting time for the geese. The easygoing Lasse and the rude Gusta both try to woo Suirii. Which one will she choose?

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 35 - The Geese-Keeper Children Search for their Father
articles.description: Nils is finally reunited with the geese, and also with the human children Osa and Mads, who are following their missing father's trail.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 44 - Bataki Gets Trapped
articles.description: Bataki the raven gets trapped in an abandoned shack. As Nils works to dig him free, he tells a story about the nearby mine.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 37 - Morten the New Father
articles.description: The goose chicks have hatched. As their new parents raise them, Rex sees the perfect opportunity to finally take revenge on Nils.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 19 - The Elk Calf is a Mommy's Boy
articles.description: The young elk Greyskin has been captured by humans. Nils tries to set him free, but Greyskin doesn't want to leave...

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 16 - Let's Pick the Boss of the Crows
articles.description: Nils tries to help the friendly crow Fumle become leader of the crows, but Rex hasn't given up on his schemes.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 13 - The Sheep of Hell's Gorge
articles.description: A storm forces the geese to land on a small island. They take shelter in a cave inhabited by a strange flock of sheep...

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 2 - The Shrunken Nils
articles.description: The farm animals bully Nils back, until a passing flock of wild geese taunt Morten, and he takes flight with Nils aboard!

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 32 - Look Out Nils, the Mountain is on Fire!
articles.description: Nils stops in a mountainside forest and makes friends with the animals there. Then he has to save them from a raging inferno!

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 33 - The Five-Bird Reconnaissance Party
articles.description: The overcrowded bird population sent five birds to explore Lapland as a new habitat. But why don't they agree on what it was like?

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 47 - The Main Event of the Village Festival
articles.description: The fastest smith always wins the shoeing contest at the village fair, but no one thinks of the horses. Only Nils can help them.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 46 - The Sea That Shines Like Silver
articles.description: The flock comes to a fishing town fallen upon hard times. Can Nils convince the seagulls to tell Sonja where the herring are?

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 39 - Don't Follow Us, Gorgo
articles.description: Gorgo the eagle wants to stay forever with the goose who raised him, Captain Akka. But is that really what's best for him?

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 41 - The Lakeside Fire Festival
articles.description: Nils is entranced by people dancing around a bonfire. He tries to hold his own fire festival, but his plans go awry.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 40 - The Attack of the Wolves
articles.description: Nils meets a lonely old woman who loves animals, and helps her repair her relationship with the townspeople who dislike her.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 29 - The Caged Great Eagle
articles.description: Left behind, Nils goes to a zoo to try and find the geese. There, he meets a caged eagle who says Captain Akka is his mother.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 34 - The Battle of the Sun and the Ice Spirit
articles.description: Nils meets the Sun, who must fight the Ice Spirit for control of Lapland... Is he dreaming, or was there truth to Captain Akka's tales?

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 28 - Nils Sings on a Street Corner
articles.description: Nils falls off Morten's back when they're startled by a gunshot. He's captured by humans and forced to perform on the street!

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 11 - The Bronze Statue Walks
articles.description: In a harbor town, Nils finds himself being chased by two living statues! He attempts a daring escape by sea.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 20 - The Snake's Revenge
articles.description: Greyskin steps on a snake and refuses to apologize, angering the snakes. They plot to make him regret what he's done.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 1 - Naughty Nils
articles.description: Nils is a lazy boy who loves to cause mischief and bully animals. But then he angers a tiny tomte, who shrinks him down to tomte size!

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 51 - To Our Dear Old Home
articles.description: Nils has decided to stay with the flock. Captain Akka takes him to see his old home one last time, but what will Morten do?

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 50 - A Gift from a Goose
articles.description: Emeric the stork brings sad news of Nils' family, and Captain Akka decides to give him a present to help them.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 45 - The Ghostly Mansion Under the Full Moon
articles.description: Nils tries to escape the cold night in a nearby mansion, but then he has to also escape its ghostly gardener!

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 31 - The Forest Spirit
articles.description: Nils encounters the musician who set him free in Stockholm. Can he help Clement win his hometown's storytelling competition?

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 30 - The Smell of Freshly-Baked Bread
articles.description: Hunger sets in as Gorgo the eagle flies north, with Nils aboard. They look for food in a village, but Rex the fox is also craving a meal!

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 25 - Aerial Rescue Party
articles.description: Nils visits a town and meets a hardworking student named Marcos. But disaster strikes when the wind blows away an important manuscript.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 24 - Go to Hell, Rex! Operation Watchdog
articles.description: Emeric brings the tomte to see how Nils has changed. But Nils won't be able to become human-sized again if Rex eats him first!

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 22 - The Twin Bear Cubs Expelled from the Forest
articles.description: Nils falls off Morten while flying through a gale. He's found by a family of bears, who want him to help protect their home.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 5 - Morten in Hot Water
articles.description: Tired of raw fish, Nils steals biscuits from a picnic basket. His stunt gets Morten captured by humans. Can Nils rescue him?

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 3 - Riding a Goose
articles.description: The flock invites Morten to join them, but hesitate when Nils admits he's human. Then a hungry fox decides on goose for dinner...

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 52 - Goodbye, Akka
articles.description: Unaware of the danger, Morten has brought his family to Nils' farm! To save him, Nils must make the most difficult choice of all.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 21 - The Weather Witch's Mischief
articles.description: Nils encounters the feared Weather Witch, Ysätter-Kaisa. He picks a fight with her, with dire consequences for everyone!

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 12 - Morten's First Love
articles.description: Morten has gone missing. While looking for him, Nils meets an injured goose named Dunfin. Can he help her fly again?

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 9 - Hungry Nils
articles.description: Cold and hungry, Nils sneaks into a human town. A good meal had better be worth being chased by children and dogs!

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 23 - The Great Flood of Swan Lake
articles.description: Rex the fox tricks the geese into going to help the haughty swans. As the birds squabble, will he get his chance to snatch Nils away?

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 15 - The Greedy Crows and the Pot of Gold
articles.description: A murder of crows find a pot of gold they can't open. Rex the fox makes a bargain with them to capture Nils.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 14 - The Phantom City Floating the in Moonlight
articles.description: Nils finds himself in a mysterious city where no city should be, and where the people welcome him... or so it seems!

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 6 - The Birds' Test of Strength
articles.description: Captain Akka holds an athletic contest to gauge everyone's strength, and Morten tries to prove he's tough enough to go to Lapland with them.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 4 - The Forest Squirrel's SOS
articles.description: The geese still don't know whether to bring Nils along. But while flying with Morten, Nils' hamster Carrot hears a voice shouting for help!

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 18 - The Lake is Going to Disappear
articles.description: The birds' prized lake is in danger of being drained by the villagers. Is there anything they can do to save their home?

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 43 - Nils the Babysitter
articles.description: An infant boy is left all alone. It's up to Nils and Carrot to keep him safe from roaring rapids, snakes, and Rex the fox!

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 38 - Lapland, Where the Sun Never Sets
articles.description: Unaware that the sun never sets in Lapland, Nils stays out too late. He tries to help a baby beaver, with dire consequences.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 42 - The Giant Who Made the Forest
articles.description: Nils climbs a tower to avoid the rain, but he's not alone. As he's hiding, one of the humans tells a story to pass the time...

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 26 - The Events on the Day of the Storm
articles.description: The flock lands on an island to wait out a storm. Then a farm horse comes to ask Nils' help for his fellow livestock trapped in a pen...

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 27 - Morten's Engagement
articles.description: Captain Akka visits the island Dunfin's family lives on, at her request. There, Morten asks her father for her hand in marriage.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 17 - The Duckling Used as Bait
articles.description: Reunited with the geese, Nils meets a captured duck used as a lure by hunters. Naturally, he can't let this stand.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 10 - Rex's Sinister Plan
articles.description: Rex the fox is hungry... for revenge. He cunningly enlists an otter and a weasel to give Nils and the geese trouble.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 8 - The Crane Ball
articles.description: At the Animal Ball, animals celebrate the coming of spring. Nils is excited to attend, but it won't be easy when he's human.

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 48 - Rex's New Journey Begins
articles.description: Rex the fox has all but given up on life, but then he meets a lovely vixen! Can he make her fall for him and start anew?

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 49 - Nils Learns a Secret
articles.description: Nils believes Captain Akka is keeping a secret from him, and runs away with Carrot. But being in the forest alone is perilous...

articles.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils Holgersson - Episode 7 - The Battle of the Rats
articles.description: The flock stops at an old castle, only to find sinister grey rats about to invade. Is there any way to repel the horde?

articles.title: Psycho Armor Govarian - Episode 23 - Dimensional Invasion Fort
articles.description: On Earth, the team searches for Meria, the one person who may have the key to destroying Glonn Deathroam, but Garadain's forces are targeting her for assassination.

articles.title: Psycho Armor Govarian - Episode 16 - Escape! Love Left Behind
articles.description: The team members plot their escape back home, but in the meantime, Hans falls in love with a local woman.

articles.title: Psycho Armor Govarian - Episode 7 - Our Battle
articles.description: Some of the team members are reunited with their parents, but when the aliens attack, the reunion ends in tragedy.

articles.title: Psycho Armor Govarian - Episode 14 - Demondos Blows Up
articles.description: The team launches an all-out assault against the alien space base, Demondos.

articles.title: Psycho Armor Govarian - Episode 19 - Hellfire on the Moon
articles.description: Christo is back in power and put in charge of the mysterious mission on the moon's surface.

articles.title: Psycho Armor Govarian - Episode 11 - Front Line in Hyperspace
articles.description: When Isamu and the others go to a military base to inform their fallen friend's father of his son's demise, Christo attacks.
